channel.title: Comments for page "Ninpo Mask"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ninpo Mask"

item.title: Only one mask
item.content:encoded:
When you alreadyown a Nimpo Mask and use a favor to remove bingo hours from your village it just says:

He helps you and your Village!
He nods at your mask, and vanishes!

No counter for removed bingo hours is showing up.
So obtaining a second mask (this way) is not possible?
